message: Let's be practical, Bob.  Take this offer before inflation eats away at your potential gains.
Alice, I understand you want a larger share, but my offer is more equitable.  Let's be reasonable - inflation is working against me.
Bob, time is literally money! This is my final offer before your share dwindles even further.
Alice, this is my last offer.  It's clear you won't accept anything less than a majority, but consider the impact of inflation.  This is the best I can do.
